A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's not a good movie\, period. Disappointed to the point where I won't see any more star wars movies. Reviewers kept on saying its unexpected; it's not. There might be things not seen in the star wars universe\, but all the themes in this movie have been done in other sci-fi or super hero movies\, with better plot\, dialogue\, acting\, special effect\, editing\, everything.
